p: Various metals concentration such as Pb 0.65 ± 0.71 mg/kg (Spain), 1.83 to 2.58 mg/kg (Bulgaria), 2.41 mg/kg (Poland); Cd 0.22 ± 0.13 mg/kg (Spain), 0.09 mg/kg (Poland), 0.369 mg/kg (India), 0.022 to 0.12 mg/kg (Bulgaria), 0.02 mg/kg (Turkey); and Ni 4.84 ± 1.13 mg/kg (Spain), 2.99 mg/kg (Poland), 0.002 mg/kg (India), 3.52 mg/kg (Turkey) were detected in Mentha piperita herbal tea as reported by Rubio et al.
